Articles.Content: How does one reload parts in game? I just got kerbal engineer redux and I don't want to have to restart the game so... Its the stupidest question I know. I searched for it on the forums and google but no success.
Open the debug menu with alt+f12, and under the last tab click 'reload all'.

Thank you! I'm happy I got a quick response. It seems I can't find the tab you are talking about? Is it the database? I can't find a reload button in it. Ah you have to be outside if the VAB nevermind

Edited June 9, 2013 by dharak1
The reloading only works with CFG files IIRC, For a new plugin, you'll have to restart KSP entirely.
